alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CHAMBERS... SOUTHWESTERN LIBERTY AND NORTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crosby, or 8 miles northeast of Barrett, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Baytown, Liberty, Dayton, Beach City, Barrett, Crosby, Mont Belvieu, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Kenefick, Cove, and Lake Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
